name: AKA-NO-RAGE
description:
AKA NO RAGE is a side-scrolling 2D Rogue-lite that mixes traditional Japanense aesthetics with futuristic Neo-Tokyo vibes in a story full of action, agile movements and combat against terrifying yokai. Gameplay

⛩ Run, jump  and dash through Neo-Tokyo city to discover every secret and kill your enemies thanks to a dynamic and fast movement which is mixed with  a vertical level design and 3 maps to play. ⛩

Combat

☯ Yokais have invaded the streets! Use Akane's katana or the talisman's magic to exorcise them and fight against the bosses to save the city. ☯

Story

🗻The futuristic city of Neo-Tokyo has left aside the traditional japanense culture  and now there's only one temple left. 

However, when the Yokais began to appear, Tokyo had to ask for help to the warriors they never welcomed.

Akane, a priestess of the temple, must face the enemies at the city reluctantly 💢 and find and annihilate what caused it.🗻

Loop Core

💀While being on adventure you might die, but wait, it's not the end. Go back to the temple and use  coins and Yokai souls to buy potions and upgrade the base stats of Akane.💀

Golden ashes

We're a team of game dev students from a university at Spain. Check out our profile to find more about us!! If you please, let us know your opinion about the game by giving feedback at the comments :)
